text: What are your favorite discussion forums for Android issues?
StackOverflow is Google's recommended go-to site for beginner questions but the way it's structured is best for simple questions with simple, black-and-white answers.

StackOverflow isn't really structured for an extended discussion where someone says "Try This" , so I post back and say "OK, I tried that, here's a screen shot of what I got" and someone else responds to that, etc.
So are there other high-quality, active Android developer forums?
When I Googled for some the ones I found were low traffic - people posting questions and a week later had no responses.
